attributes.action: After the disgusting comments Bernard Ingram should loose his knighthood.
attributes.background: Bernard Ingram has continually vilified the supporters at hillsborough on that fateful day. Even after the official verdict he still refuses to apologise as such he does not show the personal requirements of that of a knighted British citizen.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
